title: OOHTML
desc: A suite of new DOM features that provides a native and more convenient way to write modular, reusable, and reactive HTML for the modern UI.

features.title: Reusable HTML
features.desc: Write once, use everywhere with the all-new HTML modules, export and import paradigms.

features.title: Reactive HTML
features.desc: Get the plain old HTML kicking in sync with your application data, entirely within markup.

features.title: Namespaced HTML
features.desc: Write collision-free IDs with HTML namespaces; meet the hack-free approach.

features.title: All On the Fly!
features.desc: Forget the compile step! Just code and preview. Even edit from your browser console.
